name: Mr. Step Jump
description:
TIMING IS EVERYTHING! Jump up the steps to reach the highest point you can in this addictive arcade action game. Challenge your friends and beat their high scores!

-- HOW TO PLAY --
Just tap the screen at the left or right to move the character on the next path. Collect gems to unlock new character and try not to fall off the edges!

Collect diamonds to unlock new characters!
How high can you get?
